mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.hire_date AS hireDate, e.work_location AS workLocation, e.status, e.notes, e.tel, e.rrn, e.position, e.address, e.department_id AS departmentId, d.name AS departmentName FROM employee e LEFT JOIN department d ON e.department_id = d.id LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (name, email, hire_date, work_location, status, notes, tel, rrn, position, address,department_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{hireDate}, #{workLocation}, #{status}, #{notes}, #{tel}, #{rrn}, #{position}, #{address},#{departmentId})
mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.hire_date AS hireDate, e.work_location AS workLocation, e.status, e.notes, e.tel, e.rrn, e.position, e.address, d.name AS departmentName, e.salary FROM employee e LEFT JOIN department d ON e.department_id = d.id where e.id = #{id}
